acpid.description: Daemon for delivering ACPI events (Powerbutton, etc.)

addincards.description: Remove the Modelrestrictions for official Addin Cards

allowdowngrade.description: Allow Downgrade for AME, MediaServer, SynoPhotos, SS and VideoStation on DSM 7.2.2

amepatch.description: Dynamic Licensepatch for AME (only for AME 3.1.0)

arcdns.description: Dynamic DNS client for arcdns.tech - Modify in DSM DynDNS Settings

beep.description: Beep at startup and shutdown (requires motherboard with buzzer)

bootwait.description: Boot process waits until boot device (`/dev/synoboot`) and PCIe Device are available

cpufreqscaling.description: Enable CPU Freqscaling for DSM - Modify in Arc DSM Options

cpuinfo.description: Add real CPU Information to DSM System

dbgutils.description: Binaries to facilitate debug in the junior mode

dsmconfigbackup.description: Automatically backup Systemconfig Settings to the Bootloader Disk(/mnt/p1/dsmbackup) at Shutdown

eudev.description: eudev + kmod will assist with auto module loading

fancontrol.description: Control fan speeds from DSM (Incl. sensors addon, only for supported devices).

hdddb.description: Add Disks to DSM DiskDB, enable M.2 Volume and bypass Memory Limitation

i915.description: Automatically replace the device ID of i915 module. (Intel 2nd - 9th Gen)

ledcontrol.description: Add Ugreen Ledcontrol to DSM (requires sensors)

lsiutil.description: A tool for working with some LSI RAID controllers

mountloader.description: Add a script to mount/unmount loader disk in the DSM scheduled task

nvmecache.description: Enable M.2 as Cache (for DS918+ RS1619xs+ DS1019+ DS1621xs+)

nvmesystem.description: Enable DSM installation to NVMe SSDs. (For Systems with only NVMe)

nvmevolume.description: Enable M.2 as Volume (for non supported Models)

powersched.description: Utility to configure RTC according to DSM power schedule (If supported)

remotefs.description: Allow remote NFS/CIFS shared folder be used in VideoStation, AudioStation and PhotoStation

sensors.description: Install sensors package to monitor temperature of CPU and other components

setrootpw.description: Set root password and enable ssh/sftp. Modify PW="" to the desired password in DSM Task Scheduler and run the task

smartctl.description: Fix SMART information for HBA devices.

sortnetif.description: Sort network interface names: sorted by busid

storagepanel.description: Automated Storagepanel selection - Modify in Arc DSM Options

updatenotify.description: Arc Loader Update Notifications in DSM

ups.description: Force UPS to shut down in Standby mode

wol.description: Force enable the Wake-on-lan on all nic
